title: You must serve Bauchi, Gov Abubakar tells doctors
text:
Home » News » You must serve Bauchi, Gov Abubakar tells doctors You must serve Bauchi, Gov Abubakar tells doctors On 3:28 am In News by Okogba Comments 
By Suzan Edeh 
B auchi— AS part of moves to cope with the increasing demands for medical services in Bauchi metropolis, following the influx of internally-displaced persons, IDPs, from neighbouring states, Governor Mohammed Abubakar has asked all state-sponsored doctors to return and serve the state as contained in their contractual agreements. Gov. Mohammed Abubakar 
The governor, who spoke yesterday after inspecting the Specialist Hospital, Bauchi, and the Bauchi State College of Nursing and Midwifery, expressed displeasure that some critical sections of the hospital constructed and commissioned by the immediate past administration were not provided with furniture or equipment as contained in the contractual agreement 
He directed the Commissioner for Health, Dr. Halima Mukaddas, to furnish him with the emoluments of medical doctors in neighbouring states to make Bauchi State more attractive to medical doctors and the para-medics.
